item.title: CVE-2022-33943|2024-08-03T08:16:15.997Z -- nico%20amarilla -- bxslider%20wp%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (contributor or higher user role) Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Nico Amarilla's BxSlider WP plugin <= 2.0.0 at WordPress.
